meanings.definition: The unique speech patterns and vocabulary used by an individual.
meanings.sent1: She has her own idiolects that make her stand out.
meanings.sent2: It's interesting to study different idiolects in a linguistics class.
meanings.sent3: His idiolects always make us laugh during family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: Her idiolects paint a colorful picture of her personality.
meanings.sent5: Learning about idiolects helps us understand people better.

meanings.definition: The distinctive way in which a person speaks or communicates.
meanings.sent1: The idiolects of each character in the play were carefully crafted.
meanings.sent2: Understanding idiolects can improve communication in relationships.
meanings.sent3: His idiolects add charm to his storytelling.
meanings.sent4: The idiolects of the town echoed through the streets.
meanings.sent5: Listening to different idiolects broadens our perspective.
